sQuestion: Internet Company A charges a 25 dollars fee plus an additional 0.35 dollars per hour. Internet Company B charges a 10 dollars fee plus an additional 0.50 dollars per hour. For what number of hours are the charges for both companies the same?

sentences.sentence: Internet Company A charges a 25 dollars fee plus an additional 0.35 dollars per hour.
Internet Company B charges a 10 dollars fee plus an additional 0.50 dollars per hour.
For what number of hours are the charges for both companies the same?
